cause.description:
this is the best cause, possibly more important than curing cancer
1. Everyone should call mo jack BOT
2. Mo Jack should get a legal name change to BOT, bc mo jack just sounds stupid
3. Everyone should ask BOT to construct them a robot
cause.mission: legally change taha's name to BOT, and git erybody who meets BOT to call BOT "BOT"
cause.name: BOT!
